entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 11:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
